verses.text: Then \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* with his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and they \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; they \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* it, and set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of it; even unto the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Meah|strong="H3968"\w* they \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* it, unto the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Hananeel|strong="H2606"\w*.

And next unto \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*. And next to them \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imri|strong="H0566"\w*.\f + \fr 3.2 \ft next unto…: Heb. at his hand\f*

But the \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* did the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hassenaah|strong="H5570"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, who \add also\add* laid the \w beams|strong="H7136"\w* thereof, and set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* thereof, the \w locks|strong="H4514"\w* thereof, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof.

And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Meremoth|strong="H4822"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Koz|strong="H6976"\w*. And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshezabeel|strong="H4898"\w*. And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Baana|strong="H1195"\w*.

And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* the \w Tekoites|strong="H8621"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w*; but their \w nobles|strong="H0117"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* not their \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* to the \w work|strong="H5656"\w* of their \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

Moreover the \w old|strong="H3465"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Paseah|strong="H6454"\w*, and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Besodeiah|strong="H1152"\w*; they laid the \w beams|strong="H7136"\w* thereof, and set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* thereof, and the \w locks|strong="H4514"\w* thereof, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof.

And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Melatiah|strong="H4424"\w* the \w Gibeonite|strong="H1393"\w*, and \w Jadon|strong="H3036"\w* the \w Meronothite|strong="H4824"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, and of \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, unto the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*.

Next unto \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harhaiah|strong="H2736"\w*, of the \w goldsmiths|strong="H6884"\w*. Next unto \w him|strong="H3027"\w* also \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \add one of\add* the \w apothecaries|strong="H7546"\w*, and they \w fortified|strong="H5800"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto the \w broad|strong="H7342"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft fortified…: or, left Jerusalem unto the broad wall\f*

And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Rephaiah|strong="H7509"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And next unto \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Jedaiah|strong="H3042"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harumaph|strong="H2739"\w*, even over against his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And next unto \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Hattush|strong="H2407"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hashabniah|strong="H2813"\w*.

\w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*, and \w Hashub|strong="H2815"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pahath-moab|strong="H6355"\w*, \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w*, and the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of the \w furnaces|strong="H8574"\w*.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft other…: Heb. second measure\f*

And next unto \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Halohesh|strong="H3873"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, he and his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

The \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Hanun|strong="H2586"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Zanoah|strong="H2182"\w*; they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* it, and set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* thereof, the \w locks|strong="H4514"\w* thereof, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof, and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* unto the \w dung|strong="H0830"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

But the \w dung|strong="H0830"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Beth-haccerem|strong="H1021"\w*; he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* it, and set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* thereof, the \w locks|strong="H4514"\w* thereof, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof.

But the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w fountain|strong="H5869"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Shallun|strong="H7968"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Col-hozeh|strong="H3626"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*; he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* it, and \w covered|strong="H2926"\w* it, and set \w up|strong="H5975"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* thereof, the \w locks|strong="H4514"\w* thereof, and the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof, and the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* of \w Siloah|strong="H7975"\w* by the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, and unto the \w stairs|strong="H4609"\w* that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azbuk|strong="H5802"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Beth-zur|strong="H1049"\w*, unto \add the place\add* over against the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and to the \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* that was \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w Rehum|strong="H7348"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*. Next unto \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, in his \w part|strong="H6418"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Bavai|strong="H0942"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Henadad|strong="H2582"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w part|strong="H6418"\w* of \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*.

And next to \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Ezer|strong="H5829"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w another|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w* over against the going \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w armoury|strong="H5402"\w* at the \w turning|strong="H4740"\w* \add of the wall\add*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zabbai|strong="H2079"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H2734"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w*, from the \w turning|strong="H4740"\w* \add of the wall\add* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft Zabbai: also called, Zaccai\f*

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Meremoth|strong="H4822"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Koz|strong="H6976"\w* \w another|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w*, from the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* even to the \w end|strong="H8503"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*.
And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H3603"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* and \w Hashub|strong="H2815"\w* over against their \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ananiah|strong="H6055"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Henadad|strong="H2582"\w* \w another|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* unto the \w turning|strong="H4740"\w* \add of the wall\add*, even unto the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*.

\w Palal|strong="H6420"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzai|strong="H0186"\w*, over against the \w turning|strong="H4740"\w* \add of the wall\add*, and the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* which lieth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w high|strong="H5945"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that \add was\add* by the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*. \w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Parosh|strong="H6551"\w*.

Moreover the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Ophel|strong="H6077"\w*, unto \add the place\add* over against the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, and the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* that lieth \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 3.26 \ft dwelt…: or, which dwelt in Ophel, repaired unto\f*\f + \fr 3.26 \ft Ophel: or, tower\f*

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* them the \w Tekoites|strong="H8621"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w another|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w*, over against the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* that lieth \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, even unto the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Ophel|strong="H6077"\w*.

From above the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* over \w against|strong="H5048"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* them \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Immer|strong="H0564"\w* over against his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* also \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w*, the \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, and \w Hanun|strong="H2586"\w* the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zalaph|strong="H6764"\w*, \w another|strong="H8145"\w* \w piece|strong="H4060"\w*. \w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w* over against his \w chamber|strong="H5393"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* him \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w* the \w goldsmith’s|strong="H6885"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*, and of the \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*, over against the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w Miphkad|strong="H4663"\w*, and to the going \w up|strong="H5944"\w* of the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*.\f + \fr 3.31 \ft going…: or, corner chamber\f*

And between the going \w up|strong="H5944"\w* of the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* unto the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w repaired|strong="H2388"\w* the \w goldsmiths|strong="H6884"\w* and the \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*.\f + \fr 3.32 \ft going…: or, corner chamber\f*
